TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit InstanceLockQueryResult extends System.Runtime.DurableInstancing.InstanceStoreQueryResult

Docs.summary: Contains query result set represented by a dictionary of ID of instance and the instance owner which currently owns the lock on each instance.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

Docs.summary: Initializes an instance of the class with any empty query result set.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(class System.Collections.Generic.IDictionary`2<valuetype System.Guid, valuetype System.Guid> instanceOwnerIds) cil managed

Docs.param: A dictionary that represents the query result set. The dictionary has instance ID as the key and ID of the instance owner who owns the lock on the instance as the value.
Docs.summary: Initializes an instance of the class and sets the property using the dictionary of instance IDs and instance owner IDs.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(valuetype System.Guid instanceId, valuetype System.Guid instanceOwnerId) cil managed

Docs.param: The ID of the instance owner who owns the lock on the instance represented by the instanceId parameter.
Docs.summary: Initializes an instance of the class and sets the property using a dictionary that contains the single query result represented by the instance ID and the instance owner ID.

MemberSignature.Value: .property instance class System.Collections.Generic.IDictionary`2<valuetype System.Guid, valuetype System.Guid> InstanceOwnerIds

Docs.summary: Gets a dictionary that contains the query result set. The query result set is represented by a dictionary, which has Instance ID as the key and the ID of the instance owner who owns the lock on the instance as the value.
Docs.value: The dictionary that contains instance IDs and instance owner IDs.
